title: President, PM strongly condemn attack on Donald Trump during an election rally
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 14 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari and Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Sunday strongly condemned an attack on former US President Donald Trump during an election rally in Pennsylvania.
President Zardari expressed deep shock over the attack saying that such violence had no place in politics.
The president expressed his best wishes for the speedy recovery of Donald Trump and also offered heartfelt condolences over the loss of life in the attack, President Secretariat Press Wing said in a press release.
The prime minister, on X account, said just learnt that former President Trump was shot at an election rally.
“This is a shocking development. I condemn all violence in politics. Wish the former President swift recovery and good health,” he further posted.
